p: All available HA sequences from influenza A(H3N2) viruses with collection dates from 1 January 1968 to 31 July 2019 were downloaded from GISAID [ 25] and aligned using MAFFT v7.245 [ 27]. We gratefully acknowledge the hundreds of authors, originating and submitting laboratories that contributed sequences to GISAID since 1968, enabling the phylogenetic and priming epoch analyses we report here.
